message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.MM

This paper deals with the task of generating textual descriptions that are time-aligned with video content, which involves bridging the semantic gap between visual and natural language domains. This task is closely related to computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL). The paper also proposes the use of computational linguistic techniques and machine learning algorithms to match action proposals to recipe steps, which falls under the categories of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). Finally, the paper evaluates its approach on two datasets related to egocentric object interactions, which is a subfield of multimedia (cs.MM).
